channel.title: Math
channel.description: Various undocumented techniques and tricks useful for developing ADMB programs

item.title: Variance calculations
item.description: How variance is calculated in ADMB

item.title: Parameterization
item.description: Examples of how to (and not to) parameterize mathematical functions and statistical models

item.title: Adjoint code
item.description: Why to write adjoint code and alternative approaches to do it.

item.title: Covariance Calculations
item.description: A short document with accompanying R code that details (1) the functions used to bound parameters, (2) the method for calculating a bounded covariance matrix, and (3) what is stored in the binary admodel.hes and admodel.cov files and how the user can utilize this information to gain more control over an MCMC chain.
